prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Drums, Synth Lead, Organ, Guitar, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
Guitar, Organ, Synth Lead, Bass, and Drums are all featured in this song, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Drums, Synth Lead, Organ, and Guitar, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
No Piano is present in this song, which instead features Bass, Drums, Synth Lead, Organ, and Guitar.
